app.name: TradeJAudit
app.disclaimer: For journaling and analytics only. Not investment advice.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Pro-grade diagnostics across performance, consistency, and edge.

equityCurve.title: Equity curve
equityCurve.tooltip: Cumulative net P&L based on closed trades ordered by close time.
equityCurve.emptyBody: Adjust the filters to include a broader trade range.

drawdown.title: Drawdown
drawdown.tooltip: P&L drawdown computed on cumulative net P&L (peak-to-trough).
drawdown.emptyBody: Add closed trades to see drawdowns.

histogram.title: P&L histogram
histogram.tooltip: Distribution of trade net P&L, highlighting dispersion and outliers.
histogram.emptyBody: Close trades to populate the histogram.

traderRead.title: Trader read
traderRead.tooltip: Auto-generated insights with sample size context.
traderRead.emptyBody: Add more trades to surface insights.

coachSection.title: Coach insights
coachSection.subtitle: Actionable guidance generated from your own trade history.
coachSection.emptyBody: Log more closed trades to unlock coach insights.

weeklyPnl.title: Weekly grouped P&L

holdingBuckets.title: Holding time buckets

hourHeatmap.title: Hour-of-day heatmap (Net P&L)

strategyLeaderboard.title: Strategy leaderboard

risk.title: Risk analytics

rDistribution.title: R distribution
rDistribution.emptyBody: Track R multiples to see this chart.

outlierPolicy.title: Outlier policy
outlierPolicy.hint: Exclude outliers to see sensitivity changes.

kpis.title: KPIs
kpis.winRate: Percentage of closed trades that finished green.
kpis.profitFactor: Gross profit divided by gross loss.
kpis.expectancy: Average net P&L per closed trade.
kpis.payoffRatio: Average win divided by absolute average loss.

timeConsistency.title: Time & consistency
timeConsistency.drawdown: Peak-to-trough decline on cumulative net P&L.
timeConsistency.rollingMetrics: 20-trade rolling win rate and profit factor.
timeConsistency.heatmap: Hour-of-day net P&L in Europe/Bucharest time.

recentTrades.subtitle: Newest first
recentTrades.empty: No trades have been recorded yet.

help.title: Field explanations
help.kpiNetGross: Net and gross P&L show your performance after and before costs.
help.kpiWinRate: Win rate is the share of closed trades that ended positive.
help.kpiProfitFactor: Profit factor is gross profit divided by gross loss.
help.kpiExpectancy: Expectancy is average net P&L per closed trade.
help.kpiDrawdown: Max drawdown is the largest peak-to-trough decline in cumulative P&L.
help.chartEquityCurve: Shows cumulative net P&L over time.
help.chartDailyPnl: Shows net P&L grouped by day.
help.chartRecentTrades: Shows your latest trades and quick context.

empty.noTradesBody: Import real trades or add your first trade to start tracking performance.

banner.title: You're viewing demo data
banner.subtitle: This sample data is here so you can explore the platform. Import or add real trades anytime.

remove.confirmBody: This permanently deletes all demo trades, notes, and demo-related content from your profile. This action cannot be undone.
remove.error: Could not remove demo data. Please try again.

learnMore.title: About demo mode
learnMore.body1: Demo data helps you preview dashboards, analytics, calendar stats, notebook workflows, and insights right away.
learnMore.body2: Removing demo data keeps any real data you added and switches your account to real-data mode.

forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter the email associated with your account. We'll send a reset link if it exists.
forgotPassword.success: If an account exists for this email, a reset link has been sent.
forgotPassword.title: Reset your password

insightDetail.infoAlert: For journaling and educational purposes only. Not investment advice.

empty.defaultBody: Localized insights will appear here after publication.
empty.strategiesBody: Once published, strategies will show up here for everyone.
empty.weeklyBody: Weekly plans will appear here after the admin publishes them.

insights.subtitle: Published strategies and weekly plans from the team, ready for your next session.
insights.title: Insights

legal.disclaimer: Draft for review. This content should be reviewed by qualified legal counsel for your jurisdiction.

s1.title: 1. Scope
s1.body: These terms govern your use of TradeJAudit and related services.

s2.title: 2. Account responsibilities
s2.body: You are responsible for account security, accurate information, and lawful use.

s3.title: 3. Acceptable use
s3.body: Do not abuse, disrupt, reverse engineer, or use the service for unlawful activity.

s4.title: 4. Data ownership
s4.body: You retain ownership of your uploaded content. You grant us a limited license to operate the service.

s5.title: 5. Availability
s5.body: We may update, suspend, or discontinue features. We aim for reliability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access.

s6.title: 6. Financial disclaimer
s6.body: TradeJAudit is an analysis and journaling tool. It does not provide investment advice.

s7.title: 7. Liability limits
s7.body: To the fullest extent permitted by law, liability is limited to direct damages and excludes indirect losses.

s8.title: 8. Termination
s8.body: We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or applicable law.

s9.title: 9. Changes to terms
s9.body: We may update these terms. Continued use after updates means you accept the revised version.

s1.title: 1. Data we collect
s1.body: We collect account data, app settings, and content you create in the app.

s2.title: 2. How we use data
s2.body: We use data to deliver core functionality, improve reliability, and protect accounts.

s3.title: 3. Legal basis
s3.body: Processing is based on contract performance, legitimate interests, and consent where required.

s4.title: 4. Sharing
s4.body: We do not sell personal data. Data may be shared with infrastructure providers under contractual safeguards.

s5.title: 5. Retention
s5.body: We retain data while your account is active and as needed for legal or security obligations.

s6.title: 6. Security
s6.body: We apply technical and organizational safeguards, but no system is risk-free.

s7.title: 7. Your rights
s7.body: You may request access, correction, export, or deletion of your personal data where applicable.

s1.title: How cookies are used
s1.body: Cookies help keep sessions secure, remember preferences, and improve performance.

points.attachments: Attach screenshots and context to every trade.
points.fastLogging: Log trades in seconds. Review patterns in minutes.
points.performance: See performance by day, strategy, ticker, and tag.
points.playbooks: Turn notes into playbooks: setups, rules, mistakes, lessons.

hero.quote: Professionals do not chase P&L - they execute a process.
hero.subtitle: TradeJAudit is your trading journal + notebook to capture setups, review execution, and track performance - so you can trade with clarity, not emotion.
hero.title: Your edge is discipline. Build it daily.

form.riskAmountHint: Optional: improves P&L % and R multiple

corePricing.entryExitBody: Prices for entering and exiting the trade plus optional stop-loss and take-profit anchors.
corePricing.directionMarketBody: Whether the position is LONG or SHORT and the instrument type (stock, forex, crypto, etc.).
corePricing.statusBody: OPEN or CLOSED. OpenedAt marks when the position opened; ClosedAt is set when it closes.
corePricing.capitalUsedBody: Cash or margin allocated to this trade.

pnlAndRisk.feesCostsBody: All trading costs deducted from gross P&L.
pnlAndRisk.pnlGrossBody: (Exit − Entry) × Quantity (flipped for SHORT) before costs.
pnlAndRisk.pnlNetBody: P&L gross minus fees, commission, and slippage.
pnlAndRisk.pnlPercentBody: P&L net divided by capital used (or risk amount when provided), expressed as a percentage.
pnlAndRisk.riskAmountPercentBody: Monetary and percentage distance between entry and stop loss multiplied by quantity.
pnlAndRisk.rMultipleBody: P&L net divided by risk amount. 1R equals the initial risk.

context.setupStrategyCatalystBody: Qualitative tags describing why the trade was taken.
context.statusDirectionBody: Quick at-a-glance orientation for dashboards and filters.
